definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Using time series analysis methods, in this paper the prediction model of the epidemic encephalomyelitis in Heilongjiang Province were given.
sentences.chinese: 本文用时间序列分析法建立了黑龙江省流脑预测模型。

sentences.english: Spring anti-ECM, a good shepherd's purse porridge.
sentences.chinese: 春季防流脑，荠菜煮粥好。

sentences.english: The immunization history of healthy population had no direct impact on the carrier rate.
sentences.chinese: 流脑疫苗的免疫史对健康人群的带菌率无直接影响。

sentences.english: The effect of epidemic meningitis vaccine and the epidemic indication of epidemic cerebrospinal meningitis were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 并对流脑菌苗的效果和流脑流行指征进行了分析。

sentences.english: The effect of epidemic meningitis vaccine and the epidemic indication of epidemic cerebrospinal meningitis were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 并对流脑菌苗的效果和流脑流行指征进行了分析。

sentences.english: Liver puncture and electron microscopy were done immediately after death in 3 patients with fulminant form.
sentences.chinese: 死亡的暴发型流脑3例死后立即行肝穿刺电镜检查。

definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
epidemic encephalitis B, aka Japanese encephalitis
hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
